title: Analysis of Digital Media Utilization Types and Educational Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, with a program targeting elementary teachers needing digital media utilization skills in science curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can classify digital media usage types into three or more categories
Learners can analyze peer teachers' media usage patterns using survey tools
Learners can propose customized media strategies for science lesson design based on cluster analysis results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
